body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Start a New Duel
2. Select "Random Pre-made decks" and validate.
3. Update a deck with "Generate Deck" What is the expected output? What do you see instead? I was expecting Magarena to use the selection I had chosen during the New Duel setup. Instead, the newly generated decks seem to be completely random ("Unsaved deck" appears as the deck title).
It would be more logical if "Generate Deck" respected the user's choices of deck type (Pre-made, etc.) and cube. In fact, when the user selects, say, "Blue deck", then the generated decks are blue. I think that it would be less surprising if the same happened with "Random Pre-made decks" as well. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.25. Mac OS X 10.7.3. If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
